short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modeless keyboard navigation based on Vimium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Based on Vimium by Phil Crosby and Ilya Sukhar (see https://github.com/philc/vimium). Unlike Vimium, the keyboard shortcuts can be used at any time, and the default bindings use modifier keys (think Emacs, not Vim). Github: https://github.com/wolfmanstout/vimium
